commands.name: change-crypto
commands.description: Changes your watched crypto currency to the currency specified (use /list-available-crypto for all)

commands.name: force-buy
commands.description: Buys back into your crypto currency being watched when the crypto-bot is next ran

commands.name: force-sell
commands.description: Sells your currently held crypto currency when the crypto-bot is next ran and then pauses the bot

commands.name: get-configuration
commands.description: Get your current crypto-analyser bot configuration

commands.name: health-check
commands.description: Checks the health of the crypto.com exchange

commands.name: list-available-crypto
commands.description: Lists all of the available crypto-currencies on crypto.com

commands.name: set-buy-percentage
commands.description: Sets the buy percentage threshold (the decrease that has to be met before buying back into the crypto

commands.name: set-hard-sell-low
commands.description: Sets the hard-sell LOW percentage threshold (the decrease before selling and PAUSING)

commands.name: set-hard-sell-high
commands.description: Sets the hard-sell HIGH percentage threshold (the increase before selling and PAUSING)

commands.name: set-sell-percentage
commands.description: Sets the sell percentage threshold (the increase that has to be met before selling back to USDT

commands.name: set-sell-warning
commands.description: Sets the sell warning percentage - the decrease in % relative to the last purchase price
